name: Volume: A Hair Affair
description:
The time has come for you to cut your hair. For most people, this would be a standard trip to the barber's, or an hour in your bathroom with a pair of scissors. But you are not most people, and your hair is not most hair.

A bizarre romp through a world of age-old conspiracies, rough pasts, awkward confrontations and some stuff that's simply weird for weird's sake.
